category: news
title: "The AI Act: Three Things To Know About AI Regulation Worldwide"
excerpt: "The AI Act is not the first piece of AI regulation. In 2018, the European Union introduced the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) which has clauses that impact AI - notably text indicating a “right to explanation” - an area that affects AI algorithms and has been the subject of much debate since its introduction."
